original_text: because he met her in the open country, and though the betrothed young woman cried for help there was no one to rescue her.
korean_text: 남자가 처녀를 들에서 만난 까닭에 그 약혼한 처녀가 소리질러도 구원할 자가 없었음이니라

sentences.original_text: because he met her in the open country
and though the betrothed young woman cried for help
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 약혼한 젊은 여인이 도움을 외쳤지만

sentences.original_text: there was no one to rescue her
